description.en:
As a child, Mamiya Sakura mysteriously disappeared in the woods behind her grandma's home. She returned whole and healthy, but since then, she has had the power to see ghosts. Now a teenager, she just wishes the ghosts would leave her alone! At school, the desk next to Sakura's has been empty since the start of the school year. Then one day her always-absent classmate Rokudo Rinne shows up, and he's far more than what he seems! After school one day, Rinne helps Sakura deal with the ghost of a boy who has a crush on her. Rinne, it seems, knows just how to handle such ghosts, and has the skills and tools to properly dispatch them to the afterlife (for a small fee of course). Sakura starts to learn more about her mysterious classmate, and her curiosity about Rinne draws her deeper into the amazing world between life and death.  


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/rin-ne)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Circle of Reincarnation Rinne**


  
The following links are to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16546)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17656)  
[Season 3](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18755)

Can a liar lead a life of good?  
Utsuho’s truthfulness as a child resulted in an enormous catastrophe, and he decided to lie from that day forward. Raised in a village of orphans by a monk, Utsuho is an unrepentant troublemaker. The monk eventually inspires him to help people, but there’s no way Utsuho’s going to lead an honest life! Instead, he’s going to use his talents for mischief and deception for good!
Sugoi Ten Fes is focused on the N-rarity members who topped the popularity poll: Shizuku Ōsaka, Kanata Konoe, and Emma Verde

altTitles.ja: ナイトライトハウンズ

description.en: Jimmy is a gang member in one of the world's few underground cities, Silent Bay City. One day, he meets a girl and gets embroiled in a fight between the creatures of the night. Brought to you by the author of "Levius", Haruhisa Nakata, Night Light Hounds is a thrilling dark fantasy!

altTitles.ja: 俺はロリコンじゃない！

description.en: Shouji Osamu is an elementary school teacher fresh out of college about to embark on his first day. At the school gate, he was suddenly hugged by Chise, a girl he doesn't recognize who seems to know him. He later finds out that Chise is a fifth-grade student in his class, and that she lives in the same apartment building as he does. During a late-night rendezvous, he learns that nothing about their encounter is coincidental.
description.es-la: Shouji Osamu es un maestro de escuela primaria recién graduado de la universidad. En su primer día, una chica lo abrazó de repente en frente de la puerta de la escuela, es alguien a quien no reconoce y parece no conocerla. Más tarde descubre que es una estudiante llamada Chise, alumna de quinto grado que pertenece a su clase y que ella vive en el mismo edificio de apartamentos que él. Durante un encuentro nocturno, se entera de que ella viajo 12 años al pasado desde el futuro para impedir que se case con una de sus alumnas y que ella hará todo lo posible para volverse su esposa, dejando claro que nada de su encuentro es una coincidencia.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

Ayasaki Hayate, 16, the world's unluckiest boy.  
Working hard as a child for food and school fees, his unemployed and indebted parents sold him to the yakuza for his internal organs. After temporarily escaping the criminals and contemplating the benefits of a life of crime, he was saved by a wealthy young girl, who now employs him as a live-in butler.

title.en: Boku to GAL ga Fufu ni Narumade

altTitles.ja: 僕と君が夫婦になるまで

altTitles.en: Until the Gal and I Become a Married Couple

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku to Gal ga Fuufu ni Naru made

altTitles.ru: Пока мы с девушкой не станем супружеской парой

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku to Kimi (Gyaru) ga Fūfu ni Naru Made

description.en: Saku Kanakura was a boy born into a poor household. He studied hard and managed to pass the exam to an excellent high school but, it soon turned out that his parents were in debt! When it was time to pay the debt off, a mysterious gal appeared and offered to pay off their debt. A big burden was almost off Kanakura's head, but the gal made a condition in return which stated that—
description.id: Saku Kanakura adalah anak laki-laki yang lahir dari keluarga miskin. Dia belajar dengan giat dan berhasil lulus ujian ke sekolah menengah yang bagus, tetapi ternyata orang tuanya terlilit hutang! Ketika tiba waktunya untuk melunasi hutang, seorang gadis misterius muncul dan menawarkan untuk melunasi hutang mereka. Sebuah beban besar hampir terlepas dari kepala Kanakura, tetapi gadis itu membuat syarat sebagai balasannya yang menyatakan bahwa—
description.ja: 貧乏な家庭に育った少年・神長倉颯空。猛勉強の甲斐あって見事希望する高校へ合格した彼だったが、両親の借金が判明！ 借金を取り立てられていたところ、謎のギャルが現れてそれらを返済してくれることに！ 窮地を脱した神長倉だったが、ギャルが借金を肩代わりする際に彼に出した条件は――。

title.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mulher mais velha legal que me deixa louco

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer mayor genial que me vuelve loco

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng hơn tuổi lạnh lùng khiến tôi phát điên

title.en: Legend of the High School Iron Fist: Tough

altTitles.en: High School Iron Fist Legend: TOUGH

description.en: Nobody enjoys a good fight more than "Kiibo" Miyazawa, a high school student whose father is training him in the family's secret martial art. Kiibo dreams of becoming the next Bruce Lee, but his awesome fighting skills may soon surpass his idol's!
description.pt-br: Ninguém gosta mais de uma boa luta mais do que Kiibo Miyazawa, um estudante do ensino médio, cujo pai sempre o treina na arte marcial secreta da família. Kiibo tem o sonho de se tornar o próximo Bruce Lee, mas com as suas habilidades de combate impressionantes, em breve ele poderá superar o seu ídolo!

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (Noon) si Takagi-san

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

Is there a top actor who turns into a 7-
 year-old child just by kissing?! Due to an
 accidental incident, the stunt double
 'Kang-som ' must take responsibility for the
 actor who has transformed into a child
 because of her. A life of bickering with a
 prickly and sensitive superstar! While they
 worry about being found out, an
 opportunity for Kang-som to become a
 popular actor arises...?!

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

description.en: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?

altTitles.vi: Kẻ lang thang và nhành cỏ dại

description.en:
The place where I belong is with you.  
A runaway girl who knows no hope. A middle-aged detective who has lost hope. Through their meeting, this hopelessness begins to melt away.  
  
Following the death of his daughter, Assistant Inspector Yamada Hajime has lost hope in everything, and jobs like closing under-aged prostitution rings don't exactly help matters. But there he meets a girl who looks alarmingly like his late daughter. Her name is Umino Shiori, a runaway girl who's desperate enough to sell herself to escape her house but won't tell anyone why.
description.vi:
Đứa trẻ bơ vơ chẳng biết hy vọng. Thanh tra lạc lõng chẳng còn ước mong. Rồi họ gặp nhau, và nỗi vô vọng này bắt đầu tan biến.

Sau cái chết của con gái, phó thanh tra Yamada Hajime đã mất hy vọng vào tất cả mọi thứ, và công việc triệt phá các ổ mại dâm cũng không xoa dịu được ông là bao. Nhưng rồi một ngày kia, ông gặp một người trông hệt như đứa con đã mất. Tên cô bé là Umino Shiori, một cô gái vì muốn chạy thoát khỏi nhà mình mà đã tuyệt vọng đến nỗi đi bán thân, thế nhưng Umino lại chẳng bao giờ kể cho bất kỳ ai lý do vì sao mình làm thế.

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

altTitles.fr: Le régresseur de la famille déchue

description.en:
Logan McLain, a middle-aged knight fighting for the independence army, is intent on getting revenge against the empire which took over the kingdom and executed his brother when he ends up dying in battle. But when he wakes, he is a young man again, and has yet to be disowned for his terrible behavior. 

Using his experience and knowledge from his past life, Logan recruits a few talented individuals to develop new weapons, build an army, and make enough money to fund it all. 

But will he be able to make amends with his family and stop the empire's march?
description.ko:
후회로만 가득한 생.

스스로의 잘못을 깨닫고 다시 사람이 되고자 했을 때,
이미 가문은 불타 사라진 뒤였다.

발악 같은 분노로 하루하루 연명하던 삶.
그 절망의 끝에서, 간절한 염원이 하늘에 닿았다.

용서받지 못한 자.
운명을 거슬러 검을 들다.

title.en: Toshiue Elite Onna Kishi ga Boku no Mae de dake Kawaii

altTitles.es-la: La Caballero de Élite Mayor es Tierna Solo Conmigo

altTitles.en: My Elite Senior Dame Knight Only Acts Cute to Me
Older elite knight is cute only in front of me

altTitles.ja: 年上エリート女騎士が僕の前でだけ可愛い

altTitles.zh-hk: 年上的精英女騎士只在我面前表現得可愛

description.en:
Haru is a 16-year-old recruit of the "Black Hawk" 4th Cavalry Unit of the Knights' Regiment under the command of Captain Karen, a profoundly beautiful and fierce 29-year-old swordswoman, who, unbeknownst to all the unit except Haru, is a pure maiden with exactly zilch experience with men. Being privy to this delightful side of her, Haru secretly henpecks her and teases her lovingly, which turns her into a flustered and heavily-armed tomato. Watch as he slowly inches his way into her heart as he dodges her longsword!  

- Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/228090)
description.pt-br: Haru é um recruta de 16 anos da 4ª Unidade de Cavalaria "Black Hawk" do Regimento de Cavaleiros sob o comando da Capitã Karen, uma espadachim de 29 anos profundamente bela e feroz, que, sem o conhecimento de toda a unidade, exceto Haru é uma donzela pura sem nenhuma experiência com homens. Conhecendo esse lado encantador dela, Haru secretamente a domina e a provoca amorosamente, o que a transforma em uma garota envergonhada,  nervosa e fortemente armada. Observe enquanto ele avança lentamente em direção ao coração dela enquanto se esquiva de sua espada longa!

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

title.en: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai Shitai: Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu

altTitles.ja: 嘆きの亡霊は引退したい 〜最弱ハンターによる最強パーティ育成術〜

altTitles.en: Let this Grieving Soul Retire: Woe is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party

altTitles.ko: 비탄의 망령은 은퇴하고 싶어 ~최약 헌터에 의한 최강 파티 육성술~

altTitles.zh: 叹息的亡灵好想隐退~最弱猎手的最强队伍养成术~

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘆息的亡靈好想隱退~最弱獵手的最强隊伍養成術~

altTitles.pt: O fantasma da lamentação quer se aposentar - A técnica mais forte de treinamento partidário pelos caçadores mais fracos

description.en:
The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger.  
  
"Lets be treasure hunters," said Cry Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest … but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent.  
  
But that was only the beginning of his adventure.  
  
"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."  
  
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."  
"Rest assured, Cry. We'll protect you!"  
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"  
  
Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures.  
  
Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter?

[Alt Official English](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/276659/)
description.ja:
「目指すはただひとつ　世界最強の英雄だ」

幼馴染みたちと共に最強の英雄になる誓いを立てたクライだったが、早々に才能がないことに気づく。――にもかかわらず、なぜか周りからの期待だけが跳ね上がっていく日々…。そしてクライの発言によって物事はいつもトンデモない方向へ――!?
description.pt:
A idade de ouro dos caçadores de tesouros que buscam riqueza, honra, poder e glória, e exploram tesouros ao redor do mundo sem levar em conta o perigo.   
"Vamos nos tornar um caçadores de tesouros", disse Cri Andrich, que fez um juramentocom seu um amigo de infância que iria se tornar o herói mais forte, mas não tinha talento.   
No entanto, a avaliação do entorno é de alguma forma alta por algum motivo, e apenas as expectativas estão saltando todos os dias.   
Toda vez que um amigo distante da raça humana entra em fúria, subir é uma habilidade de se sentar à terra! ”Uma   
fantasia cômica popular equivocada finalmente se torna realidade  
  
  
**Link :**  
- [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6093en/)

description.en: The stories of the everyday life of a black mage and a slime that run a magic store together as master and servant.

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

title.en: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 限界OLと女子大生が〇〇する話

altTitles.en: An OL at Her Limit and a College Girl

description.en: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin, and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter, the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!
description.ja: 仕事ができて皆から頼られる完璧OL 瀬川さん。しかし家では、汚部屋で毎日コンビニ飯を食べる限界生活を送っていた。ある日、お隣に住む片付け上手でしっかり者の女子大生 安藤さんに部屋の片付けを手伝ってもらうことになり…？

title.ja: Dappou Tamer no Nariagari Boukentan ~S Rank Bishoujo Boukensha ga Ore no Juuma ni Natte Imasu

altTitles.ja: 脱法テイマーの成り上がり冒険譚 ～Sランク美少女冒険者が俺の獣魔になっテイマす～

altTitles.ja-ro: Datsuhou Tamer no Nariagari Boukentan : S rank Bishoujo Boukensha ga Ore no Juuma ni na Tamers

altTitles.en: Rise of the Outlaw Tamer and His Wild S-Rank Cat Girl
Adventure of the Outlawed Tamer with Beautiful Explorers

altTitles.zh-hk: 脫法馴獸師的成名冒險 ～S級美少女冒險家被我馴服～

altTitles.en: The Adventure Story of a Law-Breaking Tamer ~ A Beautiful S-rank Adventurer becomes my Tamed Beast ~

description.en: A Tamer is the dirtiest job because they have to deal with monsters, the job of a new rank D adventurer Lint makes him despised in the guild, but his life changes when he meets an S rank adventurer girl who tells Lint to tame her with a way in...
description.id: Job Tamer [penjinak] adalah job paling kotor karena harus berurusan dengan monster, job yang di miliki oleh petualang baru rank D Lint membuat dirinya di hina di guild, tapi kehidupannya berubah saat dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis petualang rank S yang menyuruh Lint untuk menjinakkanya dengan cara di...

altTitles.en: Mission by the Civil Servant Wizard

description.en:
Year 20XX, strange phenomena started to occur all around Japan. The best way to explain it would be a ''hole'' that connects different worlds to our world. Many otherworldly beings - magicians, demons, robots and other fantasy creatures started to appear on this side, with no way to return. With the time passing, Japan was able to adapt to this event and visitors from another world stopped to be anything unusual.   
And so, an unlucky witch named Henrietta was pulled through the ''hole'' and ended in modern day Japan without a way to return. How will she be able to live in this different world?

In the year 200X, a Japanese fleet consisting of 3 vessels leave on a mission to South America. After encountering a storm, the ship JDS Mirai find itself without its escorts and in the year 1942, traveling towards the island of Midway to face the American fleet in one of largest battles in naval history. The crew of the Mirai must decide whether or not to change the course of history by involving itself in WWII.  

---  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2002**  
  
Published in Indonesia by Level Comics.
description.ja: 200X年のイージス艦が、1942年にタイムスリップしたならば――。“来（きた）る”太平洋戦争が、その先の“みらい”が激震する!!　――海上自衛隊所属、最新鋭イージス艦「みらい」、謎の暴風雨に遭遇（そうぐう）。そしてすべての僚艦（りょうかん）、失踪（ロスト）……。やがて、1942年・ミッドウェー海戦域のド真ん中に“出現”した「みらい」は、撃墜（げきつい）された海軍将校を救助。そして、「歴史」は塗り替えられる――!!

description.en:
My ex-boyfriend of ten years, Daniel,
 married my best friend, Olivia, on
 Christmas, which is also my birthday! To
 add to the drama, world-renowned singer-
 songwriter Chris made a surprise
 appearance at their wedding, transforming
 it into a concert venue as a form of sweet
 revenge. However, the following morning,
 Chris receives some shocking news. Will
 she be able to reclaim her lost love.
 friendship, and fame?

Sanctuary is a political thriller and crime story that featured two childhood friends, Akira Hojo and Chiaki Asami, who are ruthlessly struggling to set a new paradigm of living in Japan. However, the two friends took radically different paths (playing Rock Paper Scissors to decide who does what): Akira chose the dark path and joined a Yakuza gang, while Chiaki strived to become the youngest member of the Japanese Diet. Being survivors of the Cambodian killing fields, the two characters developed an unmatched aggression and survival instincts, helping them to achieve their common ultimate goal: making Japan their own sanctuary.
description.ja: 北条彰は六本木周辺を縄張りとする暴力団・北彰会の総長。ある日、北条は組員の田代を伴い、佐倉代議士のスキャンダラスな写真をネタに強請（ゆすり）を計画。その事務所を訪れるが、そこで政治家秘書には珍しい強面（こわもて）の男に追い返されてしまう。田代が事務所に帰った頃、北条は驚いたことにその秘書・浅見千秋と会っていた。そして、北条は浅見と共に国会議事堂を見ながらつぶやく。「オレは、必ずおまえをあの赤絨毯の上に立たせてみせる！」と………

description.en:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.fr:
Emma, Norman et Ray coulent des jours heureux à l’orphelinat Grace Field House. Entourés de leurs petits frères et sœurs, ils s’épanouissent sous l’attention pleine de tendresse de « Maman », qu'ils considèrent comme leur véritable mère. Mais tout bascule le soir où ils découvrent l’abominable réalité qui se cache derrière la façade de leur vie paisible ! Ils doivent s’échapper, c’est une question de vie ou de mort !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

title.en: Fuku wo Kiru nara Konna Fuu ni

altTitles.ja: 服を着るならこんなふうに

altTitles.en: Do It This Way If You Wear the Clothes
If You're Gonna Dress up, Do It Like This

altTitles.vi: Đã ăn diện thì phải ăn diện sao cho đúng.

description.en: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.
description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Seirei-tachi no Rakuen to Risou no Isekai Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Paradise of Spirits and Ideal Life of Different World
Spirits Paradise and The Idle Another World Life

altTitles.ru: Рай духов и идеальная жизнь в другом мире

altTitles.ja: 精霊達の楽園と理想の異世界生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Seirei-tachi no Rakuen to Risō no Isekai Seikatsu

altTitles.zh: 精灵们的乐园与理想的异世界生活

altTitles.zh-hk: 精靈們的樂園與理想的異世界生活

altTitles.ja: Seireitati no Rakuen to Risou no Isekaikatsu

description.en: It's the Golden Week, and Morizono Yuuta can't wait to spend the next 11 days staying home and conquering all of his games and manga. After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.

title.en: Shingeki no Eroko-san ~Hen na Oneesan wa Danshikousei to Nakayoku Naritai~

altTitles.ja: 進撃のえろ子さん～変なお姉さんは男子高生と仲良くなりたい～

altTitles.ru: Атака на Эроко ~Взрослая сестренка, которая хочет стать ближе со старшеклассником~

description.en:
Shindou Eruko, a glasses, big breasted beauty, found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together, but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy, while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality, but after several near-misses, it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does, indeed, have feelings toward her.
  
This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)
description.pt: Shindou Eruko, uma grande beldade de seios grandes, encontrou um emprego de ajudante na empresa. Amaguri faz tudo, depois que a sua vida de NEET teve que acabar graças as suas economias. Ela imediatamente se apaixona por seu colega de trabalho, no qual se chama Hoshi, um garoto do ensino médi, enquanto a Eruko é uma mulher de 27 anos que tem problemas para diferenciar a ilusão de realidade. Ela acaba constantemente planejando se aproximar de Hoshi para transformar muitas de suas ilusões em realidade…
description.ru: Когда сбережения закончились, красотке в очках по имени Эруко пришлось прервать затворнический образ жизни и найти работу. Так она устроилась сотрудницей в сервис «Разнорабочие Амагури». В первый день работы Эруко влюбляется в коллегу Хоси, вот только есть проблема: Хоси — школьник, а Эруко — 27-летняя девушка, у которой проблемы с восприятием реальности. Эруко постоянно измышляет способы сблизиться с Хоси, чтобы воплотить свои фантазии в реальность.
description.pt-br: Shindou Eruko, uma grande beldade de seios grandes, encontrou um emprego de ajudante na empresa. Amaguri faz tudo, depois que a sua vida de NEET teve que acabar graças as suas economias. Ela imediatamente se apaixona por seu colega de trabalho, no qual se chama Hoshi, um garoto do ensino médi, enquanto a Eruko é uma mulher de 27 anos que tem problemas para diferenciar a ilusão de realidade. Ela acaba constantemente planejando se aproximar de Hoshi para transformar muitas de suas ilusões em realidade...

altTitles.ja: 救世主(メシア) ~人類を救いし者~

description.en: The story of Jesus Christ told through Manga.

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Seralization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

description.en:
“Back in the day, that place was a house filled with magic—a place where you ended up smiling even if you were crying. Surely, an invisible wizard must have lived there. Or so I thought.”  
What’s a young child to do when her mother leaves her father for another man? Or when her father remarries a woman who brings along a child from a previous marriage? Or when her childhood neighbor friend invites her to live with him?

---
- **Won the 38th Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo manga in 2014**
description.pt:
"Voltar no dia, aquele lugar era uma casa repleta de magia, um lugar onde você acabava sorrindo, mesmo se estivesse chorando. Certamente, um mágico deve ter vivido lá. Assim eu pensava. "  
O que uma criança pequena deve fazer quando sua mãe deixa seu pai por causa de outro homem? Ou quando seu pai se casa novamente e uma mulher que traz consigo uma criança de um casamento anterior?Ou quando seu amigo vizinho de infância a convida para morar com ele?!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

description.en:
After an unexpected accident, I was reborn
 in another world. Could I be the emperor's
 daughter? Or perhaps a duke's daughter?
 With a heart full of anticipation, I opened
 my eyes, and what I saw before me was...
 A white, soft puppy's front paw. Given this
 situation, I need to find a way to survive.
 The only thing possible with this small,
 insignificant puppy body is... The path of a
 lapdog, cozying up to those in power!

title.en: The Daily Lives of High School Boys

altTitles.en: Daily lives of high school boys

description.en:
High school boys are really simple and curious creatures. They want one and only one thing: girls. But they haven’t got a clue about them. Male teenagers are dumbfounded by the girls’ thought process, actions, appearance and everything in between. They spend countless hours amongst themselves discussing and arguing their theories which are usually completely off base. If only they had the courage to ask them instead of screwing around and talking about nonsensical things, they might get somewhere.  
___
[Official English Volumes](https://kodansha.us/series/the-daily-lives-of-high-school-boys/)

Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
description.ja: おもちゃの企画開発会社でグラフィックデザイナーをしている柴田かさね（しばたかさね）は、あることで悩んでいた。悩みの発端は、思いがけない事故で同僚の榎田昴（えのきだすばる）のお尻を触ってしまったこと…！ 榎田のお尻の感触が、かさねの大好きなキャラクターの着ぐるみの感触と似ていて興味を持った。けれど、それと同時に、榎田に嫌な思いをさせてしまったんじゃないかという罪悪感が拭えない。榎田は「気にしてない」と言ったけれど、その表情はどこか怯えて苦しそうで…。もっと、きちんと謝らなければ！と強く思うかさね。一方で、榎田にはある隠し事があって――。
description.ru: Касанэ Сибата работает графическим дизайнером в компании, выпускающей детские игрушки. Однажды она случайно... дотронулась до ягодиц своего коллеги, Субару Энокиды, и это напомнило ей о любимом персонаже из детства. Касанэ хочет извиниться перед Субару, не подозревая, что он скрывает...

title.en: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword

altTitles.en: The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius

altTitles.ru: От нерадивого аристократа до усердного гения

altTitles.ja: 怠惰公子、努力の天才になる

description.en:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, “the lazy lord”. Yet, in spite of others’ jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his life’s trajectory takes a complete turn...

---
- [Alternative English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword)
description.fr: Irene Perreira est un garçon qui dort pour s’enfuir de la réalité. Les gens se moquent de lui, en l’appelant 'bon à rien' , mais il n'a aucune envie de changer. Jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, il rêva d'un épéiste... C'était un rêve d'un homme sans talent qui a entraîné ses mouvements à l'épée pendant des décennies.
description.ja: 誰も期待していなかった一族の怠け者、アイルーンパレイラがついに剣を手に取る。
description.ko:
잠을 도피처로 삼아 온 소년 아이른 파레이라.
사람들은 그를 나태 공자라 부르며 조롱했지만 그는 변할 생각이 없었다.
어느 날 어느 검사의 꿈을 꾸기 전까지는...
그것은 그저 묵묵히 수십 년간 검을 휘두르며 단련하는 한 재능 없는 사내에 관한 꿈이었다.
description.ru:
Юный Айрон Парейра сделал свой мир грёз убежищем от боли трагедии прошлого. Людей забавляло это, они подняли его на смех и прозвали нерадивым аристократом. Однако подобное отношение никак не задевало нашего героя необходимостью меняться.
Так бы всё и продолжалось, не повстречай он во сне бездарного юношу, который тридцать семь лет подряд обучался владению мечом, да так и умер с оружием в руках.
description.pt-br: Irene Pareyra é um rapaz que dormia para fugir da realidade. As pessoas o zoavam, chamavam de preguiçoso, mas ele não tinha a intenção de mudar. Até que um dia ele sonhou com um espadachim… Foi um sonho sobre um homem sem talento que treinou por décadas brandindo sua espada.
description.zh-hk: 家族中的懶惰蟲終於拿起了劍！將睡覺視為逃避方法的少年艾倫．帕雷拉，即使人們都嘲笑他為懶惰公子，他依然不願改變，直到有天他夢見了一位數十年間不斷揮劍鍛練的無才男子...

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: What, You Dare Pretend in Front of Me, the Strongest in the Immortal World?

altTitles.zh: 你什么档次敢在我仙界最强面前装

altTitles.zh-ro: Ni Shenme Dangci Gan Zai Wo Xianjie Zui Qiang Mianqian Zhuang

altTitles.en: What Quality Do You Dare to Pretend in Front of Me the Strongest in the Immortal World

description.en: The world beyond the ancient mirror and the immortal realm within were originally one entity. The true power of this world lies in the hands of the divine beast with the title “Light,” who battles against a formidable enemy, the divine beast with the title “Dark.” In order to prevent the extinction of humanity, the ancestors of Cheng Song sealed off the immortal realm from the human realm using the ancient mirror, with the assistance of the divine beast of Light. Only those with the bloodline of the Yu family can activate the bronze mirror and enter the immortal realm.

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?
